topic.title: Something wrong with ZeroVerse?
topic.body:
I tried to sign up with ZeroVerse.bit by sending a bitmessage. However nothing really happens after I got acknowledgement from the bitmessage, and I am presented the same "create an ID" screen instead of obtaining a cert when I visit ZeroVerse. 

I cannot imagine that the site is run by manual effort, so there must be something wrong behind the scene. Anyone still using ZeroVerse care to comment?
